alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:34PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Erie and eastern Crawford Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cambridge Springs to 9 miles east of Atlantic. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Corry, Titusville, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Wattsburg, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Guys Mills, Cochranton, Saegertown, Hydetown, Mill Village, Blooming Valley, Townville, Spartansburg, Venango and Elgin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
